title: Old Friends and New Enemies
description: The body on the mortuary slab wasn’t who Glasgow PI Charlie Cameron was looking for.But it wasn’t a stranger.Suddenly, a routine missing persons investigation becomes a fight for survival. As Charlie is dragged deeper into Glasgow’s underbelly he goes up against notorious gangster Jimmy Rafferty and discovers what fear really is.Rafferty is so ruthless even his own sons are terrified of him.Now he wants Charlie to find something. And Jimmy Rafferty always gets what he wants.There is only one problem... Charlie doesn’t know where it is.*** Also available in this stunning new series***The best-selling: Games People Play
author: Owen Mullen
